module text
MUSSEL BEACH
/module text
module text
Mussel Beach is an independent, family owned, local seafood restaurant and grill located the heart of Delray Beach. Nestled in the heart of iconic Atlantic Avenue, we pride ourselves on serving the freshest shellfish around. Our mussels are imported daily from Prince Edward Island and all of our other seafood items are as fresh as it gets in South Florida. We also offer a variety of non-seafood items to satisfy even the most discerning foodies as well as the best happy hour on the Ave. Come to be our guest!
/module text

Nestled in the heart of iconic Atlantic Avenue, we pride ourselves on serving the freshest shellfish around. Our mussels are imported daily from Prince Edward Island and all of our other seafood items are as fresh as it gets in South Florida. We also offer a variety of non-seafood items to satisfy even the most discerning foodies as well as the best happy hour on the Ave. Come to be our guest!

module text
OUR MENU
/module text
module text
Our menu is peppered with a wide variety of delicious eats including fresh seafood, appetizers, salads, burgers, pastas, steaks, and desserts. All of our food is fresh and freshly prepared to create wonderful flavors day-in and day-out. We only use the best of ingredients so that our guests can experience the best of our creations.
/module text

We would be delighted to customize a menu for your event, featuring any of our delicious appetizers, entrees, or desserts. We can also offer select wine pairings with our in-house sommelier.  We will work closely with you to orchestrate the perfect menu for your event.
